channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed

item.title: Washington State Residents Pressed 2 for Spanish. The Bot Spoke Spanish-Accented English Instead
item.description: It looks like a user error with the Amazon Polly text-to-speech system is to blame.

item.title: Let the ‘Marvel Maximum Collection’ Take You Back to Your Childhood
item.description: If you've felt nostalgic for some older Marvel games lately, the 'Maximum Collection' is here to meet your retro needs.

item.title: Fancy a 6K monitor for your home office for less than a new MacBook? JapanNext's latest release offers huge resolution and all the connections you'll ever need
item.description: JapanNext’s 31.5-inch 6K monitor combines high pixel density, broad color coverage, connectivity options, and ergonomic flexibility at affordable pricing.

item.title: Anthropic’s Claude rises to No. 2 in the App Store following Pentagon dispute
item.description: Anthropic’s chatbot Claude seems to have benefited from the attention around the company’s fraught negotiations with the Pentagon.

item.title: Tokyo Marathon 2026 Live Streams: Free Channels, Schedule & Preview
item.description: All the ways to watch Tokyo Marathon 2026 live streams for FREE, with Sutume Kebede, Brigid Kosgei, Tadese Takele and Alexander Mutiso eyeing gold in Japan.

item.title: Polymarket defends its decision to allow betting on war as ‘invaluable’
item.description: Polymarket has been allowing people to bet on when the US would strike Iran next. Obviously, now that it's actually happened and people have died, the prediction betting market is feeling some pressure. The site has been at the center of controversy before, including suspicions of insider trading on the Super Bowl halftime show and […]

item.title: The billion-dollar infrastructure deals powering the AI boom
item.description: Here's everything we know about the biggest AI infrastructure projects, including major spending from Meta, Oracle, Microsoft, Google, and OpenAI.

item.title: This retro-inspired handheld comes with Banjo-Kazooie and Battletoads built in
item.description:
Who would've guessed we'd get to play the original Banjo-Kazooie on a handheld with just a D-pad in 2026. HyperMegaTech!'s latest release is a collaboration with Rare Ltd., the legendary game developer known for the Banjo-Kazooie franchise and, more recently, Sea of Thieves, called the Super Pocket Rare Edition.
The vertical handheld features 14 classics from the British developer, including two Battletoads titles, Conker's Pocket Tales and many more. While most of the games were released on 8- or 16-bit consoles, Banjo-Kazooie will be the headliner since it was originally released on the Nin...

item.title: Minnesota Lawmakers and Police Seek Complete Ban on Crypto ATMs
item.description: So called "pig butchering" scams are happening on an industrial scale. Politicians have noticed.

item.title: Watch Marlon Wayans React to His ‘Scary Movie 6’ Trailer
item.description: Wayans gives you a little bootlegged sneak peek at what you'll laugh at (and probably feel bad about laughing at) in 'Scary Movie 6.'

item.title: I smell a RAT — new Android malware can hack every top phone maker's security, and costs less than a second-hand iPhone
item.description: Oblivion is an Android RAT which bypasses permissions, intercepts messages, and enables hidden remote control across devices from Samsung, Xiaomi, and OPPO.

item.title: The Rubin Observatory’s alert system sent 800,000 pings on its first night
item.description: The Vera C. Rubin Observatory's automated alert system is online and already bombarding astronomers with things to look at in the night sky. The system went live publicly on Tuesday, February 24th, and on the first night dropped some 800,000 alerts about asteroids, supernovas, and feasting black holes. And that number is only expected to […]

item.title: Sam Altman Is Marketing OpenAI as America’s Wartime AI Company Whether He Intends to or Not
item.description: At the outbreak of a new war, Altman is closer than ever to the Pentagon.

item.title: How to watch the Brit Awards 2026 online for free
